nets.name: Mid-South SKYWARN Net
nets.schedule: 1st day of each month at 7:00 PM CST
nets.description: Monthly severe weather preparedness net covering the Mid-South region. Focus on SKYWARN spotter training and severe weather communications.

nets.name: Mid-South DMR Net
nets.description: Weekly general DMR net for the Mid-South area. Open discussion, check-ins, and DMR technical topics welcome.
